trans-unit.source: Keyword Reference

seg-source.mrk: Keyword Reference

target.mrk: Keyword Reference

trans-unit.source: Contains information the owner needs to find items requested by a virtual list view control

seg-source.mrk: Contains information the owner needs to find items requested by a virtual list view control

target.mrk: Contains information the owner needs to find items requested by a virtual list view control

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Contains information about a notification message

seg-source.mrk: Contains information about a notification message

target.mrk: Contains information about a notification message

trans-unit.source: Index of the item at which the search will start

seg-source.mrk: Index of the item at which the search will start

target.mrk: Index of the item at which the search will start

trans-unit.source: Flags - Type of search to perform. This member can be set to one or more of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: Flags - Type of search to perform.
This member can be set to one or more of the following values:

target.mrk: Flags - Type of search to perform.
This member can be set to one or more of the following values:

trans-unit.source: $LVFI_PARAM - Searches for a match between this structure's Param member and the Param member of an item.

seg-source.mrk: $LVFI_PARAM - Searches for a match between this structure's Param member and the Param member of an item.

target.mrk: $LVFI_PARAM - Searches for a match between this structure's Param member and the Param member of an item.

trans-unit.source: If $LVFI_PARAM is specified, all other flags are ignored.

seg-source.mrk: If $LVFI_PARAM is specified, all other flags are ignored.

target.mrk: If $LVFI_PARAM is specified, all other flags are ignored.

trans-unit.source: $LVFI_PARTIAL - Checks to see if the item text begins with the string pointed to by the Text member.

seg-source.mrk: $LVFI_PARTIAL - Checks to see if the item text begins with the string pointed to by the Text member.

target.mrk: $LVFI_PARTIAL - Checks to see if the item text begins with the string pointed to by the Text member.

trans-unit.source: This value implies use of $LVFI_STRING.

seg-source.mrk: This value implies use of $LVFI_STRING.

target.mrk: This value implies use of $LVFI_STRING.

trans-unit.source: $LVFI_STRING - Searches based on the item text.

seg-source.mrk: $LVFI_STRING - Searches based on the item text.

target.mrk: $LVFI_STRING - Searches based on the item text.

trans-unit.source: Unless additional values are specified, the item text of the matching item must exactly match the string pointed to by the Text member.

seg-source.mrk: Unless additional values are specified, the item text of the matching item must exactly match the string pointed to by the Text member.

target.mrk: Unless additional values are specified, the item text of the matching item must exactly match the string pointed to by the Text member.

trans-unit.source: $LVFI_WRAP - Continues the search at the beginning if no match is found

seg-source.mrk: $LVFI_WRAP - Continues the search at the beginning if no match is found

target.mrk: $LVFI_WRAP - Continues the search at the beginning if no match is found

trans-unit.source: LVFI_NEARESTXY - Finds the item nearest to the position specified in the X and Y members, in the direction specified by the Direction member.

seg-source.mrk: LVFI_NEARESTXY - Finds the item nearest to the position specified in the X and Y members, in the direction specified by the Direction member.

target.mrk: LVFI_NEARESTXY - Finds the item nearest to the position specified in the X and Y members, in the direction specified by the Direction member.

trans-unit.source: This flag is supported only by large icon and small icon modes.

seg-source.mrk: This flag is supported only by large icon and small icon modes.

target.mrk: This flag is supported only by large icon and small icon modes.

trans-unit.source: Text - Address of a string to compare with the item text. It is valid if $LVFI_STRING or $LVFI_PARTIAL is set in the Flags member.

seg-source.mrk: Text - Address of a string to compare with the item text.
It is valid if $LVFI_STRING or $LVFI_PARTIAL is set in the Flags member.

target.mrk: Text - Address of a string to compare with the item text.
It is valid if $LVFI_STRING or $LVFI_PARTIAL is set in the Flags member.

trans-unit.source: Param - Value to compare with the Param member of an item's $LVITEM structure. It is valid only if $LVFI_PARAM is set in the flags member.

seg-source.mrk: Param - Value to compare with the Param member of an item's $LVITEM structure.
It is valid only if $LVFI_PARAM is set in the flags member.

target.mrk: Param - Value to compare with the Param member of an item's $LVITEM structure.
It is valid only if $LVFI_PARAM is set in the flags member.

trans-unit.source: X - Initial X search position. It is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the Flags member.

seg-source.mrk: X - Initial X search position.
It is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the Flags member.

target.mrk: X - Initial X search position.
It is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the Flags member.

trans-unit.source: Y - Initial Y search position. It is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the Flags member.

seg-source.mrk: Y - Initial Y search position.
It is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the Flags member.

target.mrk: Y - Initial Y search position.
It is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the Flags member.

trans-unit.source: Direction - Virtual key code that specifies the direction to search. The following codes are supported:

seg-source.mrk: Direction - Virtual key code that specifies the direction to search.
The following codes are supported:

target.mrk: Direction - Virtual key code that specifies the direction to search.
The following codes are supported:

trans-unit.source: VK_LEFT

seg-source.mrk: VK_LEFT

target.mrk: VK_LEFT

trans-unit.source: VK_RIGHT

seg-source.mrk: VK_RIGHT

target.mrk: VK_RIGHT

trans-unit.source: VK_UP

seg-source.mrk: VK_UP

target.mrk: VK_UP

trans-unit.source: VK_DOWN

seg-source.mrk: VK_DOWN

target.mrk: VK_DOWN

trans-unit.source: VK_HOME

seg-source.mrk: VK_HOME

target.mrk: VK_HOME

trans-unit.source: VK_END

seg-source.mrk: VK_END

target.mrk: VK_END

trans-unit.source: VK_PRIOR

seg-source.mrk: VK_PRIOR

target.mrk: VK_PRIOR

trans-unit.source: VK_NEXT

seg-source.mrk: VK_NEXT

target.mrk: VK_NEXT

trans-unit.source: This member is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the flags member.

seg-source.mrk: This member is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the flags member.

target.mrk: This member is valid only if $LVFI_NEARESTXY is set in the flags member.

trans-unit.source: Remarks

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: This notification gives an application (or the notification receiver) the opportunity to customize an incremental search.

seg-source.mrk: This notification gives an application (or the notification receiver) the opportunity to customize an incremental search.

target.mrk: This notification gives an application (or the notification receiver) the opportunity to customize an incremental search.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the search items are numeric, the application can perform a numerical search instead of a string search.

seg-source.mrk: For example, if the search items are numeric, the application can perform a numerical search instead of a string search.

target.mrk: For example, if the search items are numeric, the application can perform a numerical search instead of a string search.

trans-unit.source: The application sets the Param member to the result of the search, or to another application defined value to fail the search and indicate to the control how to proceed

seg-source.mrk: The application sets the Param member to the result of the search, or to another application defined value to fail the search and indicate to the control how to proceed

target.mrk: The application sets the Param member to the result of the search, or to another application defined value to fail the search and indicate to the control how to proceed
